text: GermaNet is a lexical - semantic net that relates German nouns , verbs , and adjectives semantically by grouping lexical units that express the same concept into synsets and by defining semantic relations between these synsets .GermaNet has much in common with the English WordNet ® and can be viewed as an on - line thesaurus or a light - weight ontology .
label: Uses
